name: Dude Quest
storyline: A shady professor gifts you with a Dude ID, and invites you to his lab. Although his shady lab and less than credible appearance dissuade you, he motions you over to a green chest, containing three dudes. As you choose one, your new rival appears, and you have your first battle, before journeying out into the world in search of dudes, money and fame.
summary: Dude Quest is a satirical monster catcher RPG heavily inspired by Pokémon, released back in 2014 as a flash game. Features 59 Dudes to collect and use on your journey.
